title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Donate
body: Donate            Become a patron of your National Park by making a gift to the Mississippi Park Connection, and help sustain the Mississippi National River and Recreation Area. Visit the Mississippi Park Connection website to make an online donation, or contact Anna Waugh, Development Coordinator, by email or call her at 651-291-9119. Your 100% tax deductible donation supports park programs that engage our community and protect this nationally significant resource. Help us:   Serve 20,000 kids on the river each year through outdoor learning experiences; Restore river habitat with the help of more than 5,000 volunteers annually; Preserve the river's historic and culturally significant landmarks; Protect fish and wildlife that rely on a healthy river ecosystem.     Sign up to receive e-mail updates with news, events and information about the fund and our National Park.
